text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Nobody gives a rats ass! You are putting all of these men and women at risk for covid-19 and you know it! All for a campaign stunt! You will be held responsible for the fallout. And it will follow you forever you POS. These people are our heroes. You are a draft dodger.
